subject: Super Bowl
Stadiums and Arenas
Football
lead_paragraph: Jerry Jones embodies what the Super Bowl has become, with his $1.2 billion Cowboys Stadium, his massive video board, his go-go dancers, his parties, everything exaggerated and indulgent.
snippet: Jerry Jones embodies what the Super Bowl has become, with his $1.2 billion Cowboys Stadium, his massive video board, his go-go dancers, his parties, everything exaggerated and indulgent.
